story_summary: Dmitri Fyodorovitch arrives late and respectfully greets Father Zossima and his father, Fyodor Pavlovitch, before sitting to listen to a tense conversation. Fyodor Pavlovitch accuses Dmitri of debt, debauchery, and dishonoring a young lady, while Dmitri defends himself and exposes his father's manipulations, leading to a heated family quarrel. The scene ends with Father Zossima unexpectedly bowing to Dmitri, who then leaves the room in distress, followed by the guests departing in confusion.
evidence_quotes: Dmitri kissed his hand respectfully, and with intense feeling
Father Zossima moved towards Dmitri and reaching him sank on his knees
